name: 陳信安
objective:
本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法，其內容包括：常微分方程式、線性常微分方程式、拉普拉氏轉換、級數及傅立葉級數、線性代數及矩陣、以及積分定理。
This course introduces engineering students the mathematics in practical engineering problems. The topics covered include: ordinary differential equations, linear ordinary differential equations, Laplace transforms, series and Fourier series, linear algebra, matrix, and integration theorems.
schedule:
1. Review of Calculus
2. Ordinary Differential Equation
3. Fourier Analysis
4. Partial Differential Equation
5. Linear Algebra
6. Vector Calculus

(將視情況機動調整)
